content: * **Fighting Spiders*** is a [drama](/wiki/Drama) [television program](/wiki/Television_program) from [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) that premiered on [MediaCorp Channel 5](/wiki/Channel_5_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) on 14 April 2009. The series stars [Andie Chen](/wiki/Andie_Chen), [Edwin Goh](/wiki/Edwin_Goh) and Jason Liang. The show was created by Ngin Chiang Meng and Jenny Lim. The series' second season premiered on Channel 5 on 12 August 2010. The second season was filmed using a [Canon EOS 7D](/wiki/Canon_EOS_7D) DSLR camera. ## Plot Fighting Spiders is the story of three boys in the 1960s — Soon Lee (Edwin Goh), Charlie (Jason Liang) and Peter (Freddie Fielding) — and their adventure to find the legendary King Spider. ## Cast - [Andie Chen](/wiki/Andie_Chen) as Tony Lee - [Edwin Goh](/wiki/Edwin_Goh) as Soon Lee - Jason Liang as Charlie - Freddie Fielding as Peter - [Rebecca Lim](/wiki/Rebecca_Lim) as Susie - [Ezann Lee](/wiki/Ezann_Lee) as Annie - Siona Wu-Murphy as Sam - [Kimberly Chia](/wiki/Kimberly_Chia) as Yi Ling - [Bobby Tonelli](/wiki/Bobby_Tonelli) as Thomas Livingstone - Ethan Hsieh as Ah Huat - Peggy Ferroa as Amah - Hasif Nasir as Jamal - Fighting Spiders on [MediaCorp Channel 5](/wiki/Channel_5_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub.
